parameters.param: AUTHOR=$( git log --oneline --pretty="%ae"|head -1) echo commit author is $AUTHOR echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='COMMIT.author' value='${AUTHOR}']"

AUTHOR=$(git log --oneline --pretty="%ae"|grep -v @bots.bitbucket.org|head -1) COMMIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) echo commit author: $AUTHOR echo commit hash: $COMMIT_HASH CURRENT_BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) CURRENT_BRANCH_TYPE=$(echo $CURRENT_BRANCH|cut -d/ -f1) [ -z $AUTHOR ] && exit 1 echo "source branch type: $CURRENT_BRANCH_TYPE" echo "source branch: $CURRENT_BRANCH" echo "target branch: $TARGET_BRANCH" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='env.git.branch.source' value='${CURRENT_BRANCH}']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='env.COMMIT.author' value='${AUTHOR}']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='env.COMMIT.hash' value='${COMMIT_HASH}']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='env.git.branch.source.type' value='${CURRENT_BRANCH_TYPE}']"
